A

arcRadius - Variable in class lineFollowerSim.LineSensor
default is 0 (straight line) non zero values used for 1/2 circle, see setArcRadius method.

contestFinish() - Method in class lineFollowerSim.LFS
Call after contest stopped (Key F - Finish) Logs run to .cdf file and initiates image save

contestStart() - Method in class lineFollowerSim.LFS
Called to start contest, controller enabled, crumbs cleared, stopwatch cleared and any rotation bias added to animate optional robot icon is cleared.
contestStop() - Method in class lineFollowerSim.LFS
Stop contest - robot slowed to stop, controller disabled, stop watch stopped.
controllerIsEnabled() - Method in class lineFollowerSim.LFS

leftJustify - Variable in class lineFollowerSim.UIButton
 
LFS - Class in lineFollowerSim
LFS Class is Line Follower Simulator main class that handles: tracking the position and heading of a virtual robot based on user specified target speed and turn rate managing robot acceleration and speed (drive and turn) subject to simulator maximums generating the view of immediate surroundings of a robot reading sensor values from user defined spot and line sensors presentation of an image of the course with robot image and cookie crumb trail tracking progress of robot implements interactive marker system allowing storing multiple robot start locations and headings on a course managing list of contest courses with optional starting location and heading, also timer mode stopwatch or lap time managing contest states and producing contest run report
LFS(PApplet) - Constructor for class lineFollowerSim.LFS
 
lineFollowerSim - package lineFollowerSim
 
LineSensor - Class in lineFollowerSim
Create linear array of spot sensors, no public constructor is defined for this class, LFS method createLineSensor() is used instead.
LineSensor(PApplet, Sensors, float, float, int, int, int) - Constructor for class lineFollowerSim.LineSensor
 
lineSensorList - Variable in class lineFollowerSim.Sensors
LineSensor list, contains all instances of LineSensor objects created by LFS method createLineSensor.
lineSensorSpotLocationCalc(LineSensor, int, PVector) - Method in class lineFollowerSim.Sensors
This method is called for each line sensor index from 0 to sensor spot count -1, where it calculates robot relative coordinates of each spot based on sensor location, arcRadius and rotation parameters.
lineSensorSpotLocationCalcInit(LineSensor) - Method in class lineFollowerSim.Sensors
Used in conjunction with lineSensorSpotLocationCalc used to determine location of individual spot x,y offsets within a line sensor taking into account rotation and/or half circle mode (non-zero arcRadius).
linkObject - Variable in class lineFollowerSim.UIButton

sensors - Variable in class lineFollowerSim.LFS
Sensors class single instance - gives access to spot and line sensor lists.
Sensors - Class in lineFollowerSim
Single instance of Sensors provides access to both spot and line sensor lists created by LFS for the purpose of iterating over all defined sensors to acquire sensor intensity data from the robots current location and heading on a line following course image.

setTurnAcc(float) - Method in class lineFollowerSim.LFS

SpotSensor - Class in lineFollowerSim
Create a spot sensor, no public constructor is defined for this class, LFS method createSpotSensor is used instead.
SpotSensor(PApplet, Sensors, float, float, int, int) - Constructor for class lineFollowerSim.SpotSensor
 
spotSensorList - Variable in class lineFollowerSim.Sensors
SpotSensor list, contains all instances of SpotSensor objects created by LFS method createSpotSensor.
stop() - Method in class lineFollowerSim.LFS
Robot is slowed to stop using pre-set decelRate for speed and turnAcc rate for turn rate.

UI - Class in lineFollowerSim
simple GUI (documentation not complete)
UI(PApplet) - Constructor for class lineFollowerSim.UI
UI - UserInterface Class Supports definition of controls (buttons,check boxes,text boxes, integer and float value controls..
UIButton - Class in lineFollowerSim
Button Class, instance of which includes all possible buttons -- not using descendant classes here.
update() - Method in class lineFollowerSim.UI
Called by application program, to draw currently visible buttons and to return a reference to clicked button, if none clicked returns null.
updateSensors(int, int, int, int) - Method in class lineFollowerSim.LFS
Draw internal bitmap of robot proximity and update sensor data values, called from draw() at each simulation step, deprecated method.
updateSensorsFast() - Method in class lineFollowerSim.LFS
Update sensors for controller, executed by core LFS call before userContollerUpdate called.

VP - Class in lineFollowerSim
Very light-weight rectangular viewport for Course,Robot,Sensor and other views defined in screen absolute coordinates where the origin (0,0) is located at upper-left corner of screen.
